item.description:
“It's really fun to try different specialty teas while lunching on special yummy food. Teas normally took place in the afternoon, but with everyone's busy schedule, lunch seemed like a good time to do it.

 

Gather to visit, sip tea and have lunch. If you've never been to a Tea Party before, it's such a fun experience. You'll sip lots of different teas, try some tasty desserts and eat a variety of tea party sandwiches (I will bring a couple of different desserts).

If everyone can bring their favor tea and normal tea party sandwiches for everyone to try.  

Also, please sign up to bring two of the following by adding a comment at the bottom of the page when you RSVP:

*4 normal tea party sandwiches (cut in fours)

*Your favor kind of tea
item.how_to_find_us: Westbrook location will be emailed out one week before event
item.name: Tea Party Luncheon
